translation.en: Listen, if you don't want it, I will give it to John Kang, or the kid from Shanghai.
translation.es: Si no lo quieres, se lo daré a John Kang o al chico de Shanghái.

translation.en: Perfect. We'll see you at nine.
translation.es: Perfecto. Nos veremos a las nueve.

translation.en: What are you still doing here?
- Just for tonight. - No, I mean what's happening with the... the food truck idea?
translation.es: - Solo esta noche. - No, ¿qué pasa con la gastroneta?

translation.en: You know, traveling around the music festivals.
translation.es: Viajar con los festivales de música.

translation.en: - I love that. - I'm working on it.
- It's happening. Don't worry. - If you need help on the money part,
translation.es: - Está en proceso. Tranquilo. - Si necesitas ayuda económica,

translation.en: Dude. Do I look like I need help with the money part?
You rea-- You really want me to answer that?
- I know. - You're the sorriest looking jungle rat
translation.es: - ¿Quieres que responda eso? - No. Eres la rata de pantano más triste que haya visto.

translation.en: I've ever seen in my life.
translation.es: Eres la rata de pantano más triste que haya visto.
Lleva esto a la mesa tres.

translation.en: Uh... Eh. Table three. Thank you.
Hey, hey, hey, hey. Listen, man, I'm serious.
If you need help with the money,
translation.es: Si necesitas ayuda con el dinero,

translation.en: You, my friend, you have a dream.
translation.es: Tú, mi amigo, tienes un sueño.

translation.en: Okay. But when you're ready, let me know.
translation.es: Bien. Pero, cuando estés listo, avísame.

translation.en: I'll get you a deal on a truck, we'll trick it out at the shop.
translation.es: Te consigo un camión a buen precio, lo modificaremos en el taller.

translation.en: It'll be the envy of food truck owners everywhere.
translation.es: Será la envidia de los dueños de gastronetas.

translation.en: As soon as we... explain to them what the word envy means.
translation.es: En cuanto les expliquemos lo que la palabra envidia significa.

translation.en: The girl I was with last night, she said I was.
translation.es: Pues la chica con la que estuve anoche dijo que lo era.

translation.en: - You know where to find me, right? - Hey, stay out of jail.
translation.es: - Sabes dónde encontrarme, ¿no? - Que no te arresten.
Te dije que nada de maní.

translation.en: - No peanuts! - There are no peanuts!
No! I won't do it again. No!
Okay, come on. Hey, guy. Come on. Come on. Nobody got hurt.
translation.es: Bien, levántate. Vamos. Nadie salió lastimado.

translation.en: It's all good, it's party time--
What's the matter with you? Are you stupid?
Those guys are Triad, they'll fuck you up.
translation.es: Son de la Tríada, te matarán.

translation.en: They'll blow your brains out, asshole. Get out of here, go.
translation.es: Te volarán los sesos, imbécil. Sal de aquí, vete.

translation.en: I'll take care of it. Go.
You said you're gonna buy your own food truck, hit the road.
translation.es: Dijiste que comprarías una gastroneta y saldrías a la carretera.

translation.en: Twice a day, till you're gone. Good night.
translation.es: Dos veces al día, hasta que te vayas. Buenas noches.

translation.en: Good morning, Jenny! Say hi to Auntie Wah for me!
translation.es: ¡Buenos días, Jenny! ¡Salúdame a la tía Wah!

translation.en: - Are you okay? - Ow! Shit, man. Let me sleep.
- Tommy, what happen-- - Cut it out, Jenny! Stop!
Was it someone at the party? Were people fighting in here?
translation.es: ¿Fue alguien en la fiesta? ¿Estaban peleando aquí?

translation.en: He was doing me a favor, and got into it with that guy Chen...
translation.es: Me estaba haciendo un favor y se peleó con ese Chen...

translation.en: He-- He's fine. I-- I got him out of here before anything happened.
translation.es: Está bien. Lo saqué de aquí antes de que pasara algo.

translation.en: You have to fix this. I don't want Kai to--
translation.es: Arregla esto. No quiero a Kai...

translation.en: Kai can take care of himself!
And those guys, they won't mess with a friend of mine. They're my brothers.
translation.es: Y esos tipos no se meterán con un amigo. Son mis hermanos.

translation.en: No, they're fucking criminals! And I don't want them in here, okay?
translation.es: ¡No, son criminales, y no los quiero aquí!

translation.en: I don't need my-- my sister's permission to have a... a little...
translation.es: No necesito el permiso de mi hermana para tener un poco de...

translation.en: Don't worry about it. I'll clean it up.
Have you ever heard of Little Pete?
He was the first Chinese millionaire in the United States.
translation.es: Fue el primer millonario chino en Estados Unidos.

translation.en: The, uh... The first Chinaman to refuse to carry papers required by the Geary Act.
translation.es: El primer chino que se negó a portar la documentación de la Ley Geary.

translation.en: The first dragon head in Chinatown.
translation.es: La primera cabeza de dragón en el Barrio Chino.

translation.en: People said crossing Little Pete was like...
translation.es: Decían que desafiar a Little Pete

translation.en: erasing your name from God's journal.
translation.es: equivalía a borrar tu nombre en el diario de Dios.

translation.en: Everybody wanted a piece of Little Pete.
translation.es: Todos tenían motivos para matar a Little Pete.

translation.en: were imported from China to assassinate him.
translation.es: Los enviaron desde China para asesinarlo.

translation.en: The Irish tried to burn him out of the docks.
The police came after him with clubs and silly ordinances,
translation.es: La policía lo persiguió con macanas y decretos inútiles,

translation.en: designed to kill his soul and drive him out of Chinatown. Everything failed.
translation.es: diseñados para matar su espíritu y sacarlo del Barrio Chino. Todo falló.

translation.en: Little Pete was willing to do whatever's necessary
translation.es: Little Pete estaba dispuesto a todo

translation.en: to protect his business, his people, his territory.
translation.es: para proteger su negocio, su gente, su territorio.

translation.en: I want you to tell Alec McCullough...
translation.es: Quiero que le digas a Alec McCullough

translation.en: where he'll end up, should he continue his incursions into Chinatown.
translation.es: dónde terminará, si continúa sus incursiones en el Barrio Chino.

translation.en: On second thought, I think he'll get the message.
translation.es: Pensándolo bien, creo que captará el mensaje.

translation.en: Two bodies were found in a shipping container this morning.
translation.es: Dos cuerpos fueron localizados en un contenedor esta mañana.

translation.en: Triad's fingerprints are all over this.
translation.es: Todo indica que fue la Tríada.

translation.en: The victims were known associates of Alec McCullough.
translation.es: Las víctimas eran asociados conocidos de Alec McCullough.

translation.en: Six months ago, he relocated to San Francisco.
translation.es: Hace seis meses, se mudó a San Francisco.

translation.en: Now, McCullough's already tried to squeeze into Chinatown,
translation.es: McCullough ya intentó entrar en el Barrio Chino,

translation.en: but the dragon head, Uncle Six, ain't havin' it.
translation.es: pero la cabeza de dragón, el señor Sixto, no lo aceptará.

translation.en: My Spidey sense says we're gonna have a gang war if we don't calm things down.
translation.es: Mi sentido arácnido me dice que tendremos una guerra de pandillas.

translation.en: Let 'em take each other out. Less work for us.
translation.es: Dejémoslos matarse. Menos trabajo para nosotros.

translation.en: There's not gonna be a gang war in Chinatown, Bendix.
translation.es: No permitiremos eso en el Barrio Chino, Bendix.

translation.en: 'Cause we're gonna be all over this shit before McCullough gets any more situated.
translation.es: Porque estaremos allí antes de que McCullough se instale.

translation.en: He's recruited Uncle Six's own guy,
translation.es: Él reclutó a alguien del señor Sixto,

translation.en: She's from Bayview. She's been workin' Vice over there.
translation.es: Ella es de Bayview. Ha trabajando en Antivicio.

translation.en: She's gonna embed in Lee's crew.
translation.es: Va a infiltrar el grupo de Lee.

translation.en: Chinese ain't gonna hire a girl to steal cars, boss.
translation.es: Los chinos no van a contratar a una robacoches.

translation.en: Gavin's here because she speaks fluent Russian, just like Babinov.
translation.es: Gavin está aquí porque habla ruso, como Babinov.

translation.en: She's got experience liberating cars from their rightful owners, just like Babinov.
translation.es: Tiene experiencia sustrayendo autos de sus legítimos dueños, como Bavinov.

translation.en: You fuck up in Vice, you go home with a canker sore.
translation.es: Un error en Antivicio y vas a casa con un moretón.

translation.en: You fuck up in Chinatown, you don't go home.
translation.es: Si la cagas en el Barrio Chino, no vuelves.

translation.en: You don't have to worry about me, Bendix.
translation.es: No tienes que preocuparte por mí, Bendix.

translation.en: The only thing that you got on me...
All right, all right. Let's go.
UC assignments are there in your files. You got eyes and ears on the Triad.
translation.es: Las asignaciones están en sus archivos. Tienen ojos y oídos en la Tríada.

translation.en: You hear anything ugly, I wanna know about it.
- Kung Pao Sting and Happy Family. - Thanks.
translation.es: - Kung Pao Sting y una Familia Feliz. - Gracias.

translation.en: - Dragon Shrimp? - Is there any other kind?
Uh, I'll go get some more.
- how'd you like to try the squid? - No.
translation.es: Hannah, ¿te gustaría probar el calamar? No.

translation.en: Moo goo wrap, and lemon chicken salad.
translation.es: Rol Moo Goo y ensalada de pollo al limón.

translation.en: Seriously, how much money can you make in a food truck?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto se puede ganar en una gastroneta?

translation.en: Not as much as my boss.
How much you make selling cars?
Not enough, which is why I also steal them.
translation.es: No lo suficiente, por eso también los robo.

translation.en: You know what I don't get?
You live like a king, but I never see you working.
translation.es: Vives como un rey, pero nunca te veo trabajando.

translation.en: I live like a dog, bro, and all I do is work.
translation.es: Vivo como un perro, y lo único que hago es trabajar.

translation.en: Yeah, but that's your problem right there, brother.
translation.es: Sí, pero ese es tu problema, hermano.

translation.en: You think if you don't work like a dog, you're never gonna get anywhere.
translation.es: Crees que si no trabajas como un perro, nunca llegarás a algún lado. Debes...

translation.en: You gotta-- You gotta un- Confucius that brain of yours, man.
translation.es: Crees que si no trabajas como un perro, nunca llegarás a algún lado. Debes... Debes sacar a Confucio de tu cerebro.

translation.en: But, listen, uh... put a pin in that,
translation.es: Hablemos de eso luego. Me enteré de lo que pasó anoche

translation.en: 'cause I heard about what happened last night with Chen and Lau.
translation.es: Hablemos de eso luego. Me enteré de lo que pasó anoche con Chen y Lau. Después de que te fuiste,
con Chen y Lau. Después de que te fuiste,

translation.en: those guys took it out on Tommy,
translation.es: esos tipos se desquitaron con Tommy,

translation.en: who tried to tell them you're protected, but...
translation.es: quien trató de decirles que estás protegido,
pero ¿quién le hace caso a Tommy? ¿No?

translation.en: You might wanna call Uncle Six.
- Thanks, Kai. See you tomorrow. - See you tomorrow.
translation.es: - Gracias, Kai. Hasta mañana. - Hasta mañana.

translation.en: They're not gonna let this go.
The Triad will come for you.
- How about you just talk to them for me? - Doesn't work that way, brother.
translation.es: - ¿Qué tal si les hablas por mí? - No es así, hermano.

translation.en: For what? Who am I gonna shoot?
How about you just don't get shot?
I've been looking for you, Kai.

translation.es: Esta es la pieza del monje.

translation.en: It holds the power of a thousand monks.
translation.es: Tiene el poder de mil monjes.

translation.en: That is what's going to kill you, if you don't listen to me.
translation.es: Eso es lo que te matará si no me haces caso.

translation.en: Those warlords were the first to be corrupted
translation.es: Ellos fueron los primeros caudillos corrompidos

translation.en: by the elemental powers of the Wu.
translation.es: por los poderes elementales del Wu.

translation.en: They waged war against ancient China,
leaving the land awash in blood,
translation.es: y dejaron la tierra inundada de sangre,

translation.en: until a thousand holy monks sacrificed themselves
translation.es: hasta que mil monjes sagrados se sacrificaron

translation.en: to empower a Chosen One to stop them.
translation.es: para empoderar a un elegido para detenerlos.

translation.en: What's this got to do with me?
It exists between Heaven and Earth.
translation.es: Existe entre el cielo y la tierra.

translation.en: You're here because the Wu Powers are still with us.
translation.es: Estás aquí porque los poderes del Wu siguen con nosotros.

translation.en: Five new warlords are converging on San Francisco as we speak.
translation.es: Cinco nuevos caudillos están convergiendo ahora en San Francisco.

translation.en: I'm not a killer. I'm a chef.
translation.es: No soy una asesino, soy un chef.

translation.en: No, Kai. You are the Wu Assassin.
translation.es: No, Kai. Eres el asesino del Wu.

translation.en: The Monk Piece is in you.
translation.es: La pieza del monje está en ti.

translation.en: It gives you the power of the Thousand Monks.
translation.es: Te da el poder de mil monjes.

translation.en: Their strength flows through you. Their faces protect you.
translation.es: Su fuerza fluye a través de ti. Sus rostros te protegen.

translation.en: And when you do... you'll find the Wu and kill them...
translation.es: Y cuando lo hagas, hallarás a los Wu y los matarás

translation.en: before they destroy your world like they did mine.
translation.es: antes de que destruyan tu mundo como hicieron con el mío.

translation.en: You're in the hospital, sir. Just had an accident.
translation.es: Está en un hospital, señor. Tuvo un accidente.

translation.en: - Something-- Something happened to me-- - Yes.
You were found on the street. We're gonna take care of you.
translation.es: Sí, lo encontraron en la calle. Nos encargaremos de usted.

translation.en: You've been imbued with the power of the Thousand Monks.
translation.es: Has sido imbuido con el poder de mil monjes.

translation.en: Their faces will protect you so you can do what they could not.
translation.es: Sus rostros te protegerán para que hagas lo que ellos no pudieron.

translation.en: - I had an accident. - Yeah, I know.
translation.es: - Tuve un accidente. - Sí, lo sé.

translation.en: I'm in your phone. Emergency contact?
translation.es: Estoy en tu teléfono. ¿Contacto de emergencia?

translation.en: - I'm sorry if shit happened. - Shit did happen.
translation.es: - Lamento lo sucedido. - Vaya que sí.

translation.en: What's-- What's the matter with you?
You don't just... take on the Triad like that. What were you thinking?
translation.es: No te enfrentas así a la Tríada. ¿En qué estabas pensando?

translation.en: I was thinking they broke Jimmy's nose.
translation.es: Pensaba en que le rompieron la nariz a Jimmy.

translation.en: And, you know, Tommy never told us not to put peanuts in the--
translation.es: Y Tommy nunca nos dijo que no pusiéramos maní en...

translation.en: It's so like you. Just can't get out of your own way.
translation.es: Esto es típico de ti. Siempre metiéndote en líos.

translation.en: I know. Thanks for the lecture.
translation.es: Lo sé. Gracias por el sermón.

translation.en: Could you come work for me?
You don't belong in a food truck, and I could really use you in my kitchen.
translation.es: No perteneces a una gastroneta y serías de gran ayuda en mi cocina.

translation.en: but I've got my own problems right now.
translation.es: pero ahora tengo mis propios problemas.

translation.en: Thanks for coming to get me.
There's no friendship without love, and no love without friendship. Hm?
translation.es: No hay amistad sin amor, y no hay amor sin amistad.

translation.en: I don't have time for your Confucius bullshit right now, Mr. Young.
translation.es: No tengo tiempo para sus patrañas de Confucio, señor Young.

translation.en: He's my human potential thought leader.
I'm doing this cleanse, right? Clear my mind, you know, and then Tony said--
translation.es: Estoy purificándome, ¿sabes? Despejaba mi mente, y luego Tony dijo...

translation.en: Mr. Young... I don't care what Tony says.
translation.es: Señor Young, no me importa lo que diga Tony.

translation.en: - Here you go, Lu Xin. - Thank you, DeeDee.
translation.es: - Aquí tienes, Lu Xin. - Gracias, Deedee.

translation.en: - So, what are you doing later tonight? - Dinner with the hubby.
translation.es: - ¿Qué harás esta noche? - Cena con mi esposo.

translation.en: - Yeah, you tell him I'll bring the wine. -
translation.es: Sí, dile que llevaré el vino.

translation.en: A little birdie told me that you're looking to hire some people.
translation.es: Un pajarito me dijo que buscas contratar gente.

translation.en: Short, Latino dude? Works on auto parts?
also told me that you got a problem with women.
translation.es: me dijo que tienes un problema con las mujeres.

translation.en: Do I have a problem with women? No.
I think you're at the wrong table.
Can I get you anything to eat, hon?
Your mother was Indonesian and a Muslim. Yet, you come here often.
translation.es: Tu madre era indonesia y musulmana. Aún así, vienes a menudo.

translation.en: The first time was with you.
So you haven't discarded everything I told you.
translation.es: Así que no has descartado todo lo que te enseñé.

translation.en: Tell Marshall to watch the car.
translation.es: Dile a Marshall que vigile el auto.

translation.en: - He's going to want to eat after this. - Where?
This used to be the Song Garden. Well, they couldn't pay their rents.
translation.es: - Esto solía ser The Song Garden. - No podían pagar la renta.

translation.en: I'm gonna make the terms very favorable. Ten years...
translation.es: Haré que los términos sean muy favorables. En diez años

translation.en: Don't tell me you still feel you don't belong here.
translation.es: No me digas que todavía sientes que no perteneces aquí.

translation.en: - I don't need your help. - Everybody needs my help.
translation.es: - No necesito tu ayuda. - Todos la necesitan.

translation.en: You see, that's what I don't understand.
translation.es: Eso es lo que no comprendo.

translation.en: I plucked you out of the bowels of a ship.
translation.es: Te saqué de las entrañas de un barco.

translation.en: Saved you from a life of bondage.
translation.es: Te salvé de una vida de esclavitud.

translation.en: Sent you to school. Introduced to you...
translation.es: Te mandé a la escuela. Te presenté

translation.en: - families whose children are your best-- - I've heard this story.
translation.es: - familias cuyos hijos son tus mejores... - Ya escuché esto.

translation.en: You talk as if your father could've done any of it for you?
translation.es: ¿Hablas como si tu padre te hubiera podido ayudar?

translation.en: Look! My father loved me and he got me here!
translation.es: ¡Mi padre me amaba y me trajo aquí!

translation.en: - Galaxies, galaxies - Good to see you.
- Your brother's looking for you. - Thank you.
translation.es: - Tu hermano te está buscando. - Gracias.

translation.en: They're lined up around the corner. It's insane.
translation.es: La fila rodea la esquina. Es una locura.

translation.en: - Don't do that. - Don't do what?
Can you just accept my apology without making me feel like shit?
translation.es: ¿Podrías aceptar mi disculpa sin hacerme sentir mal?

translation.en: - That it? - I want you to know,
if Kai hadn't fucked everything up last night,
translation.es: que si Kai no hubiese arruinado todo,

translation.en: you never even would've known we were here.
translation.es: no habrías sabido que estuvimos aquí.

translation.en: That's the way I do things, okay?
translation.es: Así es como hago las cosas, ¿sabes?

translation.en: I don't-- I don't think you're a total fuckup.
translation.es: No creo que seas un desastre total.

translation.en: Seriously, I don't know what I spend my money on. I don't. It just, you know, just... poof.
translation.es: En serio, no sé en qué gasto mi dinero. Solo se acaba, ¿sabes?

translation.en: I get paid on Friday, rent's due tomorrow. I just need you to float me for a couple days.
translation.es: Me pagan el viernes, la renta vence mañana. Es un préstamo.

translation.en: - What are you doing? - I'm-- Can you just please forget about the Triad?
translation.es: Tommy, ¿qué haces? ¿Puedes olvidarte de la Tríada?

translation.en: You've been talking to Mom and Dad?
Mom and Dad think I'm a fuck- up.
Who cares what Mom and Dad think?
translation.es: ¿A quién le importa lo que piensen?

translation.en: You can just work here. With me.
- In your restaurant. - Yes, in my restaurant.
translation.es: - Es tu restaurante. - Sí, en mi restaurante.

translation.en: You took a loan from Uncle Six.
translation.es: Le pediste un préstamo al señor Sixto.

translation.en: - You didn't think I knew, did you? - You're a fucking sneak--
What would Mom and Dad say if they knew
their beloved golden child borrowed money from the Triad,
translation.es: que su predilecta pidió dinero a la Tríada

translation.en: - to renovate her beloved restaurant? - Tommy--
No, bullshit! Come on! It's just $1,200. That is nothing to you.
translation.es: ¡Vamos! Son solo 1200 dólares Eso no es nada para ti.

translation.en: It's just 1,200 bucks for two days.
translation.es: Son solo 1200 dólares por dos días.

translation.en: - For rent. - For rent, yes. For rent. Shit!
translation.es: - Para la renta. - Para la renta, sí. ¡Mierda!

translation.en: You better not be fucking with me.
translation.es: Más vale que no me mientas.

translation.en: By the way, your two new servers are illegal. Be careful.
translation.es: Por cierto, tus dos nuevos meseros son indocumentados. Ten cuidado.

translation.en: And, uh... Angela, the new girl?
She's too easy on the campers. She's gotta turn those tables.
translation.es: Le falta mano dura con los que terminan. Debe liberar esas mesas.

translation.en: Can you stay tonight? I could really use your help.
translation.es: ¿Puedes quedarte esta noche? Serías de mucha ayuda.

translation.en: Don't lie to me! Which key is it?
I told you. I'm not a killer.
translation.es: Ya te dije que no soy un asesino.

translation.en: The Wu Assassin is a hero and a killer, Kai.
translation.es: El asesino del Wu es un héroe y un asesino, Kai.

translation.en: And you are the Wu Assassin.
translation.es: Y tú eres el asesino del Wu.

translation.en: - No. Find another way. - There is no other way.
translation.es: No. - Busca otro modo. - No hay otro modo.

translation.en: The Monk Piece is in you. Evil is attracted to it.
translation.es: La pieza del monje está en ti. Atrae al mal.

translation.en: Evil will find you now. If you don't kill it, it'll kill you.
translation.es: El mal te encontrará desde ahora. Si no lo matas, te matará.

translation.en: but all who stand close to you.
translation.es: sino a todos los que están cerca de ti.

translation.en: It is better to be a dog in peaceful times,
translation.es: Es mejor ser un perro en tiempos de paz

translation.en: than a man in times of unrest.
translation.es: que un hombre en tiempos de agitación.

translation.en: The good people of Chinatown have come to embrace this axiom...
translation.es: La gente buena del Barrio Chino acogió este axioma

translation.en: as the Triad has come to rely on the feud and vendetta code of old China
translation.es: como la Tríada acogió el código de discordia y venganza de la antigua China para aplicarlo.
de la antigua China para aplicarlo.

translation.en: They flow from my hand, to the tongues and fists of my soldiers.
translation.es: Fluyen de mi mano a las lenguas y puños de mis soldados.

translation.en: But then, you took matters into your own hands.
translation.es: Pero tomaron cartas en el asunto.

translation.en: We didn't know he was protected.
We thought he was a chef.
Everyone is someone special until I tell you they're not.
translation.es: Todos son especiales hasta que digo lo contrario.

translation.en: And what did you do to him?
Nothing. We waited, but he never came home.
translation.es: Nada. Esperamos, pero nunca llegó a casa.

translation.en: We should be on the lookout for him.
Pity he's not here to protect you now.
translation.es: Lástima que no esté aquí para protegerlos.

translation.en: Just give me a second, all right?
do what I saw you do.
translation.es: hacer lo que vi que hiciste.

translation.en: And give a little bit more if you fade And do a little bit more if you can
